DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe association/correlation change patient-reported cognitive symptom work productivity gainfully employ patient receive vortioxetine Major Depressive Episode ( MDE ) .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Work Productivity Relationship With Cognitive Symptoms Patients With MDD Taking Vortioxetine
DOC.detailed_description: This interventional , Canadian , multi-site , open-label , single cohort , flexible-dose study . The study emulate naturalistic real-life setting . Investigators include Primary Care Physicians Psychiatrists work outpatient clinic . The study include adult patient diagnose MDD accord DSM-5™ . Approximately 200 patient enrol study . There approximately 100 patient receive vortioxetine first treatment current MDE 100 patient switched vortioxetine due inadequate response current antidepressant medication treatment . All patient treat vortioxetine per product monograph , dos determine appropriate investigator . The total study duration Baseline end follow-up approximately 56 week .
DOC.criteria: The patient man woman , age ≥18 year < 65 year ( In province British Columbia , patient must age 19 year old order give Informed Consent ) The patient engage volunteer work gainful employment ( work ≥20 hour per week ) enrol fulltime postsecondary study vocational training . The patient outpatient consult Primary Care Physician Psychiatrist . Patients must diagnosis MDD accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 5th Edition ( DSM5™ ) classification code 296.3x . The current MDE confirm investigator . The report duration current MDE least 3 month . The patient Baseline score ≥15 QIDSSR . The patient report least minimal level cognitive symptom define Baseline score ≥30 PDQD20 . The patient capable communicate site personnel able conduct digitsymbol substitution test ( DSST ) . The patient score > 69 DSST Screening/Baseline . The patient , opinion investigator , able complete study assessment include , limited , patientreported assessment DSST . The patient current diagnosis history manic hypomanic episode , schizophrenia psychotic disorder , include major depression psychotic feature . The current depressive symptom consider investigator resistant 2 adequate antidepressant treatment least 6 week duration maximum recommend dose ( accord Canadian labeling ) . Other protocol define inclusion exclusion criterion apply .
